title: taruvAi varam
sahitya:
taruvAi varamonru murugA enakkinrE perumidam urum andap-pErinbam uravE


anupallavi

  guruvAi irundE anru shivanAi irundAlum paramEsharukku upadEsham purindu sirandOnE


caraNam    karpakat-taruvotta arputat-tiran mikka porppadam unadinai pOTrum ippEdai En
arpanAna pOdilum narppadam urumAru sorppamEnum krupai sheyyum parivuDanE
